text: I dont know what Nicole said last night but I SWEAR I wasnt drunk. I had like three pints max, well four. Probably five. Anyway I was not drunk! I mean I cant remember much of what happened but I dont think I was drunk. I think. I dont know how I ended up with a Taxi in my garage, but it isnt mine, and Im sure that it is unrelated to NOT GETTING DRUNK last night.
